timeline.message:
Enable background player updates

* If user send tags under ServiceExtension implementation, player update should happen
* Add sendTags on background test

timeline.bodyText: The return here was removed was that intentional?
timeline.author: emawby

replies.bodyText: yeah, this was preventing the background update
replies.author: Jeasmine

timeline.bodyText: I think it would be useful to print the values here so we know why registerUser isn't possible since there are 4 possibilities
timeline.author: emawby

replies.bodyText:
we already had the

logger.debug(
         "registerUser:" +
         "registerForPushFired:" + registerForPushFired +
         ", locationFired: " + locationFired +
         ", remoteParams: " + getRemoteParams() +
         ", appId: " + appId
      );

didn't want to repeat the same data
